title: Sound that plays in the LoL Launcher as of 4.19.14_10_30_21_28
body:
does anyone know of a way to disable this?  it really irks me every time and leaves me with a pain in my chest.  i really think there should be a way to disable it for people who are easily startled, because i hate going from complete silence to some sudden noise at max volume.  

thanks

replies.body: Working on implementing a volume slider/mute option for this in the next patch or two.
It's nice to hear this from you! Thanks

> Working on implementing a volume slider/mute option for this in the next patch or two.

However, if you mute the sound, whenever it's ready to load Riot Eno will walk by and slap your glass of water off your desk before shouting "DONE!"
(This is the Alternative Ready Alert Option.)
I 100% agree. It startles me EVERY TIME, regardless of volume. Perhaps a less "sharp" sound would be nicer?

Do you mean the sudden DUNG sound when you click the "Launch" button?
If so I second that. It's very annoying to me too! I think riot should remove that or have a way to disable that.
I can't actually believe they implemented this without a way to disable it. You have got to be kidding me.
ITS SO DAMN LOUD, I WEAR EAR PHONES, MY EARS WANT TO BLEED
Well on the bright side when i am outside and the game finishes updating i can definitely hear it as it breaks my windows .
LOL, I probably wouldn't have noticed if I didn't read this.  I find it amusing that it annoys people.
